name: The Darwin dating app
description:
Welcome to Darwin dating app!!

Do you want to have a romantic date but don't know if
the person you will find is your best option?

Are you tired of all those petulant and boring men?

if the answer is "yes" then try our revolutionary app!

the process is simple!

you select the men who want to date you, and through a
natural selection process, you will receive the winner!

only the best of these men will have the honor of dating you!

What are you waiting for, download it now!

SUBMISSION FOR #AdvJam2022

Features
  • Original soundtrack by ascari
  • survive in a cage with very little resources
  • Plan your own strategy for not dying
  • different characters
Instructions
  • use only left-click
  • a tutorial is contained within the game, just not skip it!
  • left-click to skip dialogue
  • press esc to quit game, any time
are you an influencer/youtuber/streamer???

download screenshots and logo here
